title: Introduction to Hypnotherapy for Relationships
body: In this introduction to the Hypnotherapy for Relationships audio meditations, instructor Sophie Fox shares some insights to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.
teaser: In this introduction to the Hypnotherapy for Relationships audio meditations, instructor Sophie Fox shares some insights to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.

title: Open to Love
body:
This Open to Love guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed at people who may be finding it difficult to be open to love.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.  Perhaps you’ve been hurt in the past or you just can’t open up to others. If you’re the type of person who puts up a wall to keep other people from getting too close, then understandably this might be having a negative impact on your relationships.  This audio will allow you to be open to love so you can let someone in completely, move on from any negative past experiences and finally have hope and a new sense of purpose to finding love. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to being more open to love.
teaser: This Open to Love guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed at people who may be finding it difficult to be open to love.

title: Timidity
body:
This Timidity guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who are shy, lack in self-confidence or courage or who might hold back for fear of embarrassing themselves. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. If you suffer from a lack of self-confidence, courage to do the things you want, extreme shyness or have shy feelings that build into a powerful fear – you might even find yourself avoiding social situations or holding back on trying new things. This session will help you overcome your shyness and fears resulting in you feeling more confident and much more self-assured. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to being more confident to live the life you want.
teaser: This Timidity guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who are shy, lack in self-confidence or courage or who might hold back for fear of embarrassing themselves.

title: Dating Confidence
body:
This Dating Confidence guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who need more confidence to date. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Both men and women can struggle with dating confidence. It can hold so many people back from meeting the right person or attracting a partner or the type of relationship that they want.  If you approach dating full of anxiety and with a negative inner critic you’re more likely to have a negative experience and the person you are on that date with will feel that energy. This session will help you to build your inner confidence whilst dating so you radiate positivity and you genuinely enjoy your dating experiences. In this session we will help you to feel more confident, take control and manage your blushing when you feel stressed or anxious. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to having more confidence when dating.
teaser: This Dating Confidence guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who need more confidence to date.

title: Loneliness
body:
This Loneliness guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who might live on their own, or spend a lot of time on their own and suffer from loneliness. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.  Loneliness is a feeling of disconnection from society and for many people, loneliness can significantly impact your quality of life and your physical and mental health. This session will help you to manage those internal feelings and help you find ways to create healthy relationships to combat loneliness. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to feeling less lonely.
teaser: This Loneliness guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who might live on their own, or spend a lot of time on their own and suffer from loneliness.

title: Grieving Loss
body:
This Grieving Loss guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who have lost loved ones and are suffering from feelings of grief. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring. Grief can cause a lot of overwhelming emotions.  You may feel like you can’t quite process your grief or perhaps you feel overwhelmed and not able to concentrate.  Perhaps you may be so busy and overworked that you haven’t given yourself time to grieve or perhaps your grief interrupts you all the time so that you are overwhelmed by intense feelings of sadness, so that you can’t get anything done. We all deal with grief in different ways, but often it can become problematic.  In this session we will help you find a way of giving yourself the time to find some calm and peace for yourself - allowing you to process your grief, at a pace that is right for you.  We will help you overcome your grief and loss so you can reach a stage where you can enjoy the memories of your loved one without being overcome by the pain of missing them. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to dealing with grief.
teaser: This Grieving Loss guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who have lost loved ones and are suffering from feelings of grief.

title: Relationship Insecurity
body:
This Relationship Insecurity guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who have feelings of insecurity with their partner in their relationship.

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.  Many people feel jealous and insecure even if they are loved unconditionally by their partner. Whether you’re in a relatively new relationship or a long term commitment this audio will help you start to feel more happy and secure in yourself and your relationship. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to being more secure in your relationship.
teaser: This Relationship Insecurity guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who have feelings of insecurity with their partner in their relationship.

title: Getting Over an Ex
body:
This Getting Over an Ex guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who have broken up in a relationship but are finding it hard to move on due to holding on to past memories together. 

Please make sure you have listened to our introduction video at the start of this series to help understand how guided meditation and hypnotherapy works and all the benefits it can bring.  Walking away from a meaningful relationship is always going to be difficult. When it wasn't your decision, a break up can be even harder.  Breakups are one of the most traumatic things that can happen in our adult lives — but the important thing is to not let it affect your confidence and having the ability to move on.  In this session we will help you to deal with a relationship loss, so you can move on with your life and experience all the benefits of a new relationship. We recommend that you listen to our session at least four times so you can really compound the positive messaging, override the old beliefs and help your mind create new neural pathways to getting over an ex.
teaser: This Getting Over an Ex guided meditation & hypnotherapy session is aimed for people who have broken up in a relationship but are finding it hard to move on due to holding on to past memories together.
